title: A thief in jail
description:
Hello your Highness,
This your captain guard speaking.
We have a thief in our jail for two weeks.
It would be great if you could state your judgment, should we hang him?
Oh, yes, I almost forgot.
He stole some food from a market stall
supposedly for his sick family.
Ah! He stole right in front of my guys! What an idiot!
Oh... well, my apologize for my vocabulary your Highness.
Well then, hang or not hang?

title: A thief no more in jail
description: Hello Highness, remember the thief from last week? Well, we have another kind of problem with him. He kind of flee. I immediately send five men after him, but maybe I shouldn't have.
buttons: Send men to bring him back (5M)

title: Ball with Farstan son
description:
Hello your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan, let me express you all my condolence for your father.
A ball will be hold next week between some of my friends.
Let me offer to you to go to this ball with my dear son, without any thoughts of course, just to allow you to forget your sorrow for a couple of hours

title: Hunt with Farstan
description:
Hello your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan, let me express you all my condolence for your father.
Let me offer to you to go hunt with me, allowing you to forget your sorrow for a couple of hours

title: No harvest this month
description: Your Highness, my most sincere condolence for your father death. I hope you are doing well. I send you this letter for an urgent matter. Last month, the cold destroyed our harvest. Your father promised us he will pay as if our harvest were done without a problem to allow us to have money to buy food for our family despite this unfortunate event. I am sure you share his values and would agree to fulfill his promise.

title: My own cook steals from me!
description:
Hello your Highness.
I send you all my condolence for your lose.
And I send you this letter about a crime of the most abject nature.
No later than yesterday, I saw one of my cook steals my wife necklace.
He stole it just in front of chamberlain eyes!
Of course, I execute him this morning.
But now his familly say it was a lie and claims compensation.
Would you please provide me some soldier to teach them how to respect the noblemen from your country?

title: Mage Circle Wish
description: Hello, your Highness. I am the Mage Circle Representative. As you may know, we work for the crown to develop new magic systems to answer the crown and citizen needs. But recently, some member of the Mage Circle started to wish study our island, on more a scientifical aspect than creating new magical object. Of course, we cannot decide to stop our work on our own. So here I am to ask you if we can leave aside our usual work to focus ourselves on the study of the island. But if you want us to work on something, just tell it

title: More roads!
description: Hello. I know you are a kind sovereign, and you wish the best for your people and the development of Arim. With this idea in mind, allow me to express an idea: what about construction a road to the little village of Nasir? They are so isolated, I am sure a road will benefit to everyone, faster development for them, more client for me, some gold for you.

title: Can't go to the mountain lake
description: Your Highness, I understand it is not really your problem, but it is a big one for me. See, each years I travel from east to west with my sheeps and I always stop by Trysam on the way. But this year, the Church men prevent me to approach the city. I don't understand, since when is it prohibited to go out there? Help me to access the city, the travel is too long otherwise.

title: Gift merchant
description: Hello Your Highness, I am a merchant from Nasir! Thank you for creating the road. I sell some goods from my village, would you like to buy some?

title: Expedition to the island
description: Your Highness, let me introduce myself. I am Sir Foliram from the merchant guild. I have recently set my eyes on the island on the North-east of our magnificent land. I am sure there is people living out there, and, for sure, potential client. I have sent some of my ship out there, but they only are fish boat, they cannot travel so long distance. I realized my mistake after they are departure from the port and are now lost to the sea. But I am sure than, with your assistance, we can set an expedition and contact the island inhabitant. Can I hope receive your help?
buttons: Refuse: give gold for lost boats (5)

title: Expedition to the island
description: Your Highness, let me introduce myself. I am Sir Foliram from the merchant guild. I have recently set my eyes on the island on the North-east of our magnificent land. I am sure there is people living out there, and, for sure, potential client. I have sent some of my ship out there, but they only are fish boat, they cannot travel so long distance. I realized my mistake after they are departure from the port and are now lost to the sea. But I am sure than, with your assistance, we can set an expedition and contact the island inhabitant. Can I hope receive your help?
buttons: Refuse: give gold for lost boats (1)

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: My daughter mariage
description: Hello Your Highness. This weekend I celebrate my dear daughter mariage. I would like for you to come to celebrate with us. Will you make us the honor of your presence?

title: Hunt at the wrong place
description:
Hello Your Highness.
I am no more than one of your peasant. I wished to bring some fresh meat for my engrossed woman so I start hunting in the forest near my house. But suddenly a man just go out of nowhere, claiming this land is his. I have always learned the earth belong to everyone, but now he says I have to pay a compensation for using his land. I am too poor to pay him, please your Highness, help me!
buttons: Send men to "explain" yourself with the noble (9M)
Let the peasant cope on his own

title: Strange bones in my field
description: Your Highness, I've found something strange in my field while working the land last week. I don't know what it is, never something so big. Looks like a bone. Maybe some giant, but never knew there was some here before.  I don't know what I should do about it, bones don't burn well so I thought maybe you would be interested.
buttons: Let him do as he want

title: Protection for my daughter
description:
Hello Your Highness.
Here is your humble servant Farstan.
I know it must seems abrupt, but I need your assistance on a little thing.
My daughter must go to one of here friend feast next week.
Unfortunately, she has no one to accompany her and I fear something could happen to her on the way. Would I dare to ask you to provide some men to protect her?

title: Road to Trysam closed
description: Your Highness. One of my employee come back yesterday with a strange new : all the road to Trysam seems to be closed. It is quite an infortunate news as some of my most important clients live there. Would I dare to ask your assistance to reopen the way to Trysam?

title: Road to Trysam closed
description: Your Highness. One of my employee come back yesterday with a strange new : all the road to Trysam seems to be closed. It is quite an infortunate news as some of my most important clients live there. Would I dare to ask your assistance to reopen the way to Trysam?

title: The thief family
description: Hello your Highness. I am the wife of Ratrem. He was caught eight month ago for a thief. I will not say he is innocent and I do not condone his action. But it's been more than half a year he is missing in his daughter life. Maybe you could release him, or at least proceed to his judgment?

title: The thief family
description: Hello your Highness. I am the wife of Ratrem. He was caught eight month ago for a thief and you killed him afterwise. I will not say he was innocent and I did not condone his action. But it's been more than half a year since his death, we were already poor. I tried to do my best to rise our daughter, but it became impossible for me, it's been a week I did not eat to allow my daughter to get enough food but I am now too weak. You are now my last hope to survive.
buttons: Adopt her child and let her die (7F)

title: The thief family
description: Hello your Highness. My name his Ratrem. I was caught eight month ago for a thief and you decided to release me. Thank you your Highness. I found a job and do not need to steal anymore. I would like to send some gold to express my gratitude.

title: The thief family
description: Hello your Highness. My name his Ratrem. I was caught eight month ago for a thief. I managed to flee and I think you did not send your men after me otherwise I would have been caught. Thank you your Highness. I found a job and do not need to steal anymore. I would like to send some gold to express my gratitude.

title: Start War
description: As your command, we start to chartering the vessels to launch an attack on the island. Thanks to the mage circle we already have some vessels, so I think we should focus our attention on the production of weapons or recruting more men.

title: Start War
description: As your command, we start to chartering the vessels to launch an attack on the island. Thanks to the mage circle we are sure to have efficient weapons for the fight, so I think we should focus our attention on producing more vessels to be sure to be able to transport everyone, but we can also recruting more men.

title: Start War
description: As your command, we start to chartering the vessels to launch an attack on the island. To finish the preparations for the war, you can choose on which points we should focus our attention, we can either produce vessels to be sure to be able to transport everyone, produce weapons adapted for this situation or try to recruit more men.

title: Hydra - Victory
description: We successfully killed the Hydra your Highness! Your people seem quite pleased by the new. How about hosting a feast to celebrate this victory? We could eat some part of the hydra at the occasion.

title: Hydra - trophy
description: Your Highness, I heard you killed a Hydra recently. I would love to have it to expose its head in my hall. Of course, I will give you some gold in exchange of such a lovely trophy. Best regard, Lord Loniriss

title: Hydra - to sell
description: My salutations your Highness, I hope this letter find you well. The word about you killing a hydra reach my ears. For a mutual profit, I offer to you to give me the body, I will sell it and, of course, we will share the money I could get from it.

title: The hydra eat everything!
description: Your Highness. I have a big problem. I tried to ask some soldiers to repeal a hydra, but I was told YOU decided to invite it to stay in our sea. Now it is eating all the fish around the eastern seaboard. Please, do something.

title: Dreadful gift
description: Your Highness. I come with some news. Our vessels departed for the island and should reached it within the week, but the islander did not see with a good eyes this much vessels approaching them. We received something from them this morning... The head of the merchant you helped to launch his expedition.
buttons: Send condolence to the merchant family

title: Expedition result
description: Hello Your Highness! I don't know if you remember me, you helped me to launch an expedition to the island near our island. I have encounter the islander and made some trade with them. They are enchanted by this encounter and seems realy interested to know us better. We could pursue the exchange, but I will need men and food to assure the transport.
buttons: Agree to provide men and food every week (5M, 5F)
Refuse to establish a commercial road

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.

title: Invitation to the Loniriss feast
description: Your Highness, it is my ulmost pleasure to invite you to my annual feast. As you know, all the noblemen of Arim will be there and we all sincerily hope for your presence.

title: Feast at the Loniriss manor
description: A feast is to be given in Trysam for the most famous noble family of the area, but the Church prevents any outside visitors, who even know what they may have done to our friends the Loniriss. Help us bring them back to reason! (And open the way for us for this celebration, it is an event that you should A-BSO-LU-TLY not miss)!

title: Irrigation system
description: Hello your Highness, I heard 'bout some kind of system used by the mage to transport water in their tower. Just thought, wouldn't it be great if we had the same thing to bring water to our plantation? But I've no idea on how it must work, but I'm sure someone as you must know and help us to implement it? It will truly help us to work.

title: War result
description: Hello Your Highness, we just got the message from the front line. Thanks to your hard work, we finally killed the king and captured their prince. We won the war at the cost of 50 of our men life. What should we do about the prince?

title: War result
description: Hello Your Highness, it is an emergency. Our men were defeated, the islanders are at our door. I am sorry your Highness, it is the end.

title: Monster come down from the mountain
description: Hello Your Highness, here is a priest from Trysam. I wrote to you to notify you of a changment in the surrounding monsters behaviors. They look more nervous than usual and start to go down the mountain to go in the forest. I fear they may attack some cities and felt I had to inform you.
buttons: Send men to protect the cities (10M)
Offer to the villagers to take refuge in the capital (12F)

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one. Do not forget the island chief was interested by you, I am sure you can propose to him.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan son was interrested by you. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one. Do not forget the island chief was interested by you, I am sure you can propose to him.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan son was interrested by you. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage.
Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom and I think sir Farstan would be happy to propose to you his daugther. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Your mariage
description:
Hello your Highness.
It may seems too soon for you, but I think the time as come for you to think about your mariage. Some options offer to you. The most logical would be to marry a noble. But you can still marry a merchant child to bring gold to our kingdom. Of course, nothing prevent you from marrying a farmer or no one.

title: Festival!
description: Hello, Your Highness. As you must know, this month will be held our annual festival for the foundation day of our country. As the queen to be, it is your place to lead the parade. But it may be dangerous, and the guard could not be able to protect you during it because of the crowd. So it may be a better idea to not participate, even if it may disapoint your people.
buttons: Go to the parade with guards

title: Festival!
description: Hello, Your Highness. As you must know, this month will be held our annual festival for the foundation day of our country. As the king to be, you should take part of the tournament. It could be dangerous of course, but your are trained since a young age to hold weapons, and your people would be happy to see you. But the final decision is up to you.

title: Festival!
description: Hello, Your Highness. As you must know, this month will be held our annual festival for the foundation day of our country. As the king to be, you should take part of the tournament. It could be dangerous of course, but your are trained since a young age to hold weapons, and your people would be happy to see you. But the final decision is up to you.

title: Monsters attack on the roads
description:
Hello Your Highness, I hope you are well.
I wrote to you regarding the last events.
With the agitation of the monsters, some are on the roads and attack the merchants. The latter now refuse to use the forest roads unless they have an escort, did you want to give them one?

title: It's outrageous!
description: Your Highness! I, Lady Iry just saw something absolutely outrageous! I was walking down the street, looking at the goods sold by the merchant when I saw it. My brother ring, on the merchant stall! And he tries to sell it to me! My brother dies during the monster attack, this merchant must have thief it from my brother body, or from his house. I am sure all his abject merchandise are stolen objects from people dead or which flee their house. You surely not can let him be?
buttons: Give the goods back to Iry (4M)

title: Problem with the mountain
description: Hello Your Highness, here is the mage circle. Thank you again for letting us study our island. Our research allow us to reveal some strange activity coming from the mountain. I am sure it is link to the change in the monsters behavior. The earth seems to abnomarlly shakes and to eat up under the pick of the mountains. Furthermore, the water of the mountain lake seems full of sulfur. We have no idea for now of what does this imply, but we fear the worst.
buttons: Require an emergency meeting next month

title: Revolution
description: Your Highness, it's an emergency! It's the peasants, they've started to regroup themselves to protest, I don't know nor where, but they have founded weapon and started to assault the castle. They are here for your head, you must flee!

title: Exeptional harvest
description: Hello Your Highness, we have a good new! The harvest was exeptional this year, what should we do about the extra?
buttons: Hold a feast and invite the noble

title: We need your protection
description: Your Highness, it's terrible! The monster attacked our cart while we where fleeing the city. All our guards died and there is no one left to protect us. You surely can't let our noble family perish? So, send you some of your best men.

title: A thief!
description: Your Highness, there was a thief! A thief! Here, in the capital! It's horrible, terrible, inacceptable. You must send men to catch the culprit! And bring me back my goods!

title: Blockade on the capital city!
description: Your Highness, it's an emergency! The merchant of the island made a blockade on our city. They prevent everyone to enter or leave. We didn't receive the food supply from the peasants this week and it looks like we won't get it this month. And we can't count on the gold too
buttons: Talk to the merchant on person
